books.title: The Iliad
books.author: Homer
books.summary: The epic poem which follows a Greek warrior who refuses to give up his prize of war.

books.title: The House on the Cliff
books.author: Franklin W. Dixon
books.summary: After visiting a suspected haunted house, two brothers and their friends embark on an adventure to see if there’s trouble afoot.

books.title: The Diary
books.author: Samuel Pepys
books.summary: The diary of a man living in London in the 17th century.

books.title: Personal Recollections of Joan of Arc
books.author: Mark Twain
books.summary: A fictional biography of Joan of Arc from her early teenage years to her martyrdom.

books.title: The Story of the Treasure Seekers
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: Six siblings search for treasure in order to restore their lost family fortune.

books.title: Brewster’s Millions
books.author: George Barr McCutcheon
books.summary: A young man stands to gain a fortune—but only if he loses one first.

books.title: Oedipus Rex
books.author: Sophocles
books.summary: A king tries to save his citizens from a devastating plague.

books.title: The Chessmen of Mars
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: Tara, Princess of Helium and daughter of John Carter, finds life-threatening adventure in thrilling far-off regions of Barsoom.

books.title: Albert Savarus
books.author: Honoré de Balzac
books.summary: A mysterious lawyer shows up in a town, opens a practice, and starts a newspaper.

books.title: The Case of Charles Dexter Ward
books.author: H. P. Lovecraft
books.summary: A young scholar delves into his family past and finds more than he bargained for.

books.title: Travel Essays
books.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
books.summary: A collection of Robert Louis Stevenson’s travel essays.

books.title: A Bid for Fortune
books.author: Guy Boothby
books.summary: A young Australian man struggles to reclaim his love from the clutches of an evil mastermind.

books.title: Seven Pillars of Wisdom
books.author: T. E. Lawrence
books.summary: T. E. Lawrence’s memoir of leading the Arab revolt against the Ottoman empire during World War I.

books.title: The Rights of Man
books.author: Thomas Paine
books.summary: A philosopher and political activist presents a forceful argument in favor of the principles of the French Revolution and of republicanism in general, together with a condemnation of monarchy and hereditary power in general.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: T. S. Eliot
books.summary: A collection of T. S. Eliot’s poetry, including “The Love Song of J. Alfred Prufrock,” “The Waste Land,” and “The Hollow Men.”

books.title: The Importance of Being Earnest
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.summary: A comedy skewering Victorian high society.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Ray Bradbury
books.summary: A collection of science fiction and fantasy stories by Ray Bradbury ordered by date of publication.

books.title: Children’s Stories
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.summary: A collection of Oscar Wilde’s children’s stories.

books.title: The Imitation of Christ
books.author: Thomas à Kempis
books.summary: Thomas à Kempis provides instructions for a Christian spiritual life.

books.title: South!
books.author: Ernest Shackleton
books.summary: A British expedition sets off to cross Antarctica, but when their ship is wrecked they have to face a long struggle for survival.
